contentList.content: Stoneskin

This character is a Stoneskin, granting them <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hitpoints</LSTag> equal to 15% of their max health. They are 33% bigger in size and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage.
Stormcaller
Necromancer
Pyromancer
This character is a Pyromancer, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Fire damage.
This character commands the forces of the undead, summoning a Ghoul and gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Acid and Necrotic damage.
This character is imbued with the power of storms, granting them <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Lightning.
Cryomancer
Druid
Berserker
Assassin
Paladin
This character is a Paladin. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Radiant and Necrotic damage. Their weapons also deal Radiant damage.
This character is a Shapeshifting Druid. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Poison and Acid damage. They cannot become diseased.
This character is a Berserker. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, as well as +2 bonus to their Damage and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
This character is an Assassin. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Poison and Psychic damage, and they can turn invisible.
Illusionist
This character is a Master of Illusion. They create illusions of themself, and they gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Psychic and Force damage.
This character is a Cryomancer. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Cold damage.
Chance for Champion Mode to activate when health threshold is reached
Champion Activation Chance
Percentage of Max Health to trigger Champion Mode.
Enable Champions
Trickster
This character is a Trickster, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Charm and Fear effects.
Healer
This character is a Healer, gaining a 20% bonus to all healing effects.
Priest
This character is a Priest, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Radiant damage and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.
Webweaver
This character is a Webweaver, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Poison and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Bludgeoning damage.
Shaman
This character is a Shaman, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic and Force damage.
Golden
This character has been turned to gold, gaining a golden appearance and special properties.

When an enemy reaches a percentage of their max health, they may become Champions.
They gain buffs in their respective School.
Oathbreaker
This character is an Oathbreaker, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant and Necrotic damage.
Bloodthirsty
This character is Bloodthirsty, gaining extra damage and healing whenever they attack. They also gain immunity to Bleed effects.
Heretic
This character is a Heretic, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Charm and Fear effects.
Transforming
This character is a Ceremorph. They are slowly transforming into a powerful Mind Flayer. Defeat them before it's too late.
